item.dc:creator: @Tix Tix
item.description:
@Tix wrote:

[quote=“tomato721, post:3, topic:449857”][quote author=Tix link=topic=552752.msg4050368#msg4050368 date=1342457959]
Hey, Im trying to make an command that spawns you an melee set and deletes 1M coins but when i have 1m in my inventory it deletes 1m but still when i got no coins in my inventory it spawns the melee set. Please Help!
Heres my code: [code=javascript] if (cmd[0].equalsIgnoreCase(“melee”)) {

		if (!player.getInventory().containsItem(995, 1000000)){
		player.getPackets().sendGameMessage("You Need <col=ff0000>1M Coins</col> To Buy Melee Set!");

}
else{

		player.getInventory().containsItem(995, 1000000);
		player.getPackets().sendGameMessage("You've Just Bought Melee Set!");
		player.getInventory().deleteItem(995, 1000000);
		player.getInventory().addItem(1215, 1);
		player.getInventory().addItem(6737, 1);
		player.getInventory().addItem(8850, 1);
		player.getInventory().addItem(6570, 1);
		player.getInventory().addItem(7462, 1);
		player.getInventory().addItem(10828, 1);
		player.getInventory().addItem(1127, 1);
		player.getInventory().addItem(1079, 1);
		player.getInventory().addItem(4151, 1);
		player.getInventory().addItem(11732, 1);
		player.getInventory().addItem(6585, 1);
		}

}[/code]
[/quote]
use this[/quote]

[font=arial black][size=36pt]TYSM![/size][/font]

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Tix Tix
item.description:
@Tix wrote:

Hey, Im trying to make an command that spawns you an melee set and deletes 1M coins but when i have 1m in my inventory it deletes 1m but still when i got no coins in my inventory it spawns the melee set. Please Help!
Heres my code: if (cmd[0].equalsIgnoreCase("melee")) { player.getInventory().containsItem(995, 1000000); player.getPackets().sendGameMessage("You Need <col=ff0000>1M Coins</col> To Buy Melee Set!"); } else { player.getInventory().containsItem(995, 1000000); player.getPackets().sendGameMessage("You've Just Bought Melee Set!"); player.getInventory().deleteItem(995, 1000000); player.getInventory().addItem(1215, 1); player.getInventory().addItem(6737, 1); player.getInventory().addItem(8850, 1); player.getInventory().addItem(6570, 1); player.getInventory().addItem(7462, 1); player.getInventory().addItem(10828, 1); player.getInventory().addItem(1127, 1); player.getInventory().addItem(1079, 1); player.getInventory().addItem(4151, 1); player.getInventory().addItem(11732, 1); player.getInventory().addItem(6585, 1); }
